amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds authorized in the bill from being obligated or expended to plan a contingency operation in Iran.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 110-151 to prevent funds authorized in the bill for the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan from being obligated or expended to plan a contingency operation in Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 216 (Roll no. 364).
